channel.title: Can I Still Run My Server Without A Router?
channel.description:
Can I Still Run My Server Without A Router?
Recently my router broke, and im not sure if i can still run it.
Thanks

item.title: Can I Still Run My Server Without A Router?
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Lord_Pker Pk Lord Pker
item.description:
@Pk_Lord_Pker wrote:

o.O You need to do portforwarding.
goto :
http://portforward.com

item.title: Can I Still Run My Server Without A Router?
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Lord_Pker Pk Lord Pker
item.description:
@Pk_Lord_Pker wrote:

Then How Your Using The INterNET?

[quote=“mage_burst, post:1, topic:226955”]Can I Still Run My Server Without A Router?

Recently my router broke, and im not sure if i can still run it.

Thanks[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2008, 11:28:44 am[/size][hr]Plus You Can Run It … But You NEED TO PORTFORWARD AGAIN …
if ur using wireless now Do Start Then Run Then TYPE CMD THEN A BLACK SCREEN COMES TYPE IPCONFIG
then get the dufault getaway AND OPEN UR INTERNET AND OPEN IT AND PORTFORWARD ?! :),
I DONT NEEED REP

Read full topic
